content.prompt: The model above represents zones that are present in many American cities. Which of the following design concepts of urban development is likely to have the most significant impact on the reduction of urban sprawl?

choices.label: Transformation of warehouse space in zone 2 of the model into high-income rental properties
Construction of a large single-family housing development in zone 4 of the model
Gentrification of older housing in selected neighborhoods in zone 3 of the model
Construction of a large shopping mall in zone 1 of the model
Mixed-use land development in zone 5 of the model

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
